title: Get ready for this placement season with nucleusFUSION!
content:
We‚Äôre a student-led community that connects you with alumni from PES University who are already working in the organizations you‚Äôre targeting. Get insights on how to prepare for interviews, learn more about the company culture, and get your questions answered directly from those who have been in your shoes.

Why Nucleus Fusion?

üîó Check it out now: [nucleusFUSION](https:// nucleusfusion dot netlify dot app/)
